message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps meet somewhere closer to $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is significant.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate your response. Would it be possible to lower the price to $12,000? This would allow me to purchase the product without exceeding my financial limits.
